text: No problem! Let me get that ready for you.

You can get help from Citizen's Advice here https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/consumer/scams/check-if-something-might-be-a-scam.                                    
Depending on the scam, it may also be a good idea to speak to your bank or, in cases of fraud, the police - a good resource can be found here https://www.actionfraud.police.uk/.                                      
With email scams, it can also be a good idea to change your password.

Here are some useful resources:                                                    Citizen's Advice https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/consumer/scams/check-if-something-might-be-a-scam                                                            Action Fraud (a police website)                                                           https://www.actionfraud.police.uk/.

Here are some useful resources:                                                        Which                                                                                https://www.which.co.uk/consumer-rights/advice/how-to-spot-a-scam-alFiz5h8mnJ9                                                Citizen's Advice https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/consumer/scams/check-if-something-might-be-a-scam                                                            Action Fraud (a police website)                                                           https://www.actionfraud.police.uk/.
You can report online fraud to the police here https://www.actionfraud.police.uk/
